DataSourcePortable.Name: CRM_SUGAR_STATUS
DataSourcePortable.Content:
<DataSourceDefinition> <FromSql Alias="A" SelectCommand="SELECT CASE 
 WHEN STATUS = 1 THEN 'Processar'
 WHEN STATUS = 2 THEN 'Cadastrado'
 WHEN STATUS = 3 THEN 'Empresa já existe'
 WHEN STATUS = 4 THEN 'CNPJ Inválido'
 END ROTULO,
 COUNT(HANDLE) TOTAL
FROM K_CRM_SUGAR
GROUP BY STATUS
" /> <Fields> <Field Alias="ROTULO" From="A" Path="ROTULO" /> <Field Alias="TOTAL" From="A" Path="TOTAL" /> </Fields> </DataSourceDefinition>
